entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (aurilia_chief_engineer.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_4: Okay, okay. Everything looks good so far. Please don't stop working. Oh hello. Sorry, I didn't see you there. I've got to keep this shield generator running. If I don't...well, I don't know what would happen, but it can't be good. My predecessors in this job usually died whenever we were attacked, so I'd rather not chance it.
entries.s_5: Tell me about the Nightsister headdress in the Adventurers' Guildhall.
entries.s_6: Nightsister headdress!??! Oh no, please don't tell me we're under attack by Nightsisters! That's all I need. Oh, just a second. Does this have anything to do with the Nightsister that Captain Sarguillo imprisoned?
